title: Religion Profile Template
description: Defines a religion including its gods, founding story, symbols, relics, holy sites, worship practices, afterlife beliefs, and clergy structure. Start with history because the founding story generates most other elements.

god_attributes_emphasized.description: Which attributes of the god(s) are emphasized in worship

founding_story.description: How this religion was founded (the prophetic event)

death.description: How the prophet died -- martyrdom creates enemies, artifacts, and sites

symbols.description: Religious symbols derived from the god's attributes or founding events

colors.description: Religious colors (mood and state of mind associations)

relics.description: Holy relics from the founding story or significant events

afterlife_belief.description: What followers believe about the afterlife

legal_influence.description: How this religion influences law (if at all)

x-cross-references.god-profile: Gods worshiped are defined in God Profiles
x-cross-references.afterlife-design: Afterlife details are in the Afterlife Design Sheet
x-cross-references.clergy-profile: Clergy details are in the Clergy Profile
x-cross-references.religion-history: Historical events are in the Religion History Sheet
x-cross-references.religion-beliefs-practices: Detailed beliefs in the Religion Beliefs and Practices Template
x-cross-references.religion-membership: Membership details in the Religion Membership Sheet
